shows.title: Potential of Fascia / Spirit Entities & Protection
shows.first_half: Visionary leader Jason van Blerk explored the role of the body's fascia and how working with it can radically shift our physical and mental health. Followed by psychic Michelle Welch on spirit communication, entities, and psychic protection.

shows.title: AI & Human Evolution / Channeling & Spirit Guides
shows.guests: Matthew James Bailey, Melissa Gates Perry
shows.first_half: First Half: Pioneer of human and artificial intelligence, Matthew James Bailey will discuss AI, human evolution, and universal wisdom. Matthew will help us to understand where our technology is headed in the coming years and what this means to humankind.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Intuitive channel Melissa Gates Perry talks about her work with contracted soul guides, spiritual specialties, and gifts that come with incarnation. She'll also delve into Earth changes and how incarnated souls are here to assist in the ascension that is going on at this time.

shows.title: Natural Remedies / Kenneth Arnold Sighting
shows.first_half: First Half: Randi Shannon, a naturopathic doctor, will explore the various natural remedies that can aid in managing ailments and health issues, complementing modern medicine. She believes that supplementation and natural remedies are essential when it comes to everyday health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Shanelle Arnold is an author and the granddaughter of ufologist and American aviator Kenneth Arnold. She'll discuss her grandfather’s work and his historic sighting of flying saucers on June 24, 1947, two weeks before Roswell. She'll also reveal Kenneth’s part in the Maury Island investigation.

shows.title: Human Exceptionalism / Global Unity
shows.first_half: First Half: Lawyer and author Wesley J. Smith will outline what he considers threats to human exceptionalism (the idea that humans are superior to all other species). According to Smith, these threats include bioethics, biotechnology, euthanasia, assisted suicide, genetic engineering, and transhumanism.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Performer and spiritual student Seth Stewart will discuss grounded spirituality and global unity consciousness. He'll explore the topics of unity in a divided world, and humanity’s spiritual crossroads, as well as explain how he helps to answer the call to co-create a future rooted in authenticity and love.

shows.title: Knights Templar Cave / Dreaming Dynamics
shows.guests: Dr. Kathleen Ball, Edward Bruce Bynum
shows.first_half: First Half: Writer and explorer of ancient sites, Kathleen Ball, Ph.D., will discuss the mysterious Knights Templar cave in Brazil, where the Templars were said to travel from Portugal sometime between 1390-1415 and discover a gold mine. She'll also talk about new discoveries in Portugal and France that connect Leonardo da Vinci to the Templars.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and clinical psychologist Dr. Edward Bruce Bynum speaks about the nature of dreaming, including scientific research and clinical understanding. He'll also address the paranormal and spiritual dynamics of dreaming, including OBEs and lucid dreaming.

shows.title: Past, Future, & Parallel Lives / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Hypnotherapist Dr. Bruce Goldberg joins guest host Connie Willis (info) to speak about his work with past life regression, future life progression, and reincarnation. He'll also explore the concept of "paragression," relating to parallel lives and the entities we can encounter in the fifth dimension. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Connie a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
